vscode.quick.start.welcome.contents:
Quickly start your journey to Serverless
[Credential Management](command:serverless-devs.access)
[Create an application](command:serverless-devs.createApp)
[Component Management](command:serverless-devs.component)
In addition, You can quickly refer to and learn more graphic cases through [Get started quickly](https://docs.serverless-devs.com/serverless-devs/quick_start).
vscode.dev.docs.welcome.contents:
You can check the [Help Documentation](https://docs.serverless-devs.com/serverless-devs/readme) before using the plugin to have a deeper understanding of Serverless-Devs and this plugin. You can also learn and explore quickly through the following links
[Quick Start Case](https://docs.serverless-devs.com/serverless-devs/quick_start#%E4%B8%8A%E6%89%8B%E4%BD%93%E9%AA%8C)
[Serverless Application Introduction](http://www.devsapp.cn/application.html)
[Serverless Devs  YAML Specification](https://docs.serverless-devs.com/fc/yaml/readme)
[Yaml extend and Multi-Environment Practice](https://docs.serverless-devs.com/serverless-devs/extend)
[Integration with Common CI/CD Platforms](https://docs.serverless-devs.com/serverless-devs/cicd)
vscode.learn.more.welcome.contents:
If you encounter any problems with the current tool, you can find us on [Github Issues](https://github.com/Serverless-Devs/Serverless-Devs/issues), and you are welcome to work with us to build the project. 
[Access repository](https://github.com/Serverless-Devs/Serverless-Devs)
vscode.local.resource.welcome.contents: You can quickly refer to and learn more graphic cases through [Get started quickly](https://docs.serverless-devs.com/serverless-devs/quick_start).
